# golbat

> A free, open-source metadata inspector for developers. Preview how your links appear on Telegram, Discord, Slack, X/Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and WhatsApp before sharing.

golbat helps developers inspect Open Graph tags, Twitter Cards, and other link metadata across 7 platforms. Features include live previews, metadata quality scoring, AI-powered analysis, copy as HTML/JSON, image dimension validation, keyboard shortcuts, URL history, and dark mode.
